adverb.description: As a musical direction: in a light, delicate manner.

noun.description: A passage to be played lightly and delicately; a performer's manner of playing or singing passages of this kind; lightness and delicacy of touch.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in The Morning Post. From Italian leggero, † leggiero, specific use of leggero, † leggiero light, delicate.
